name: discord-connect-hub
description: Complete Discord integration for Clawdbot with automatic UI installation, setup wizard, credential management, and plugin architecture hooks
author: OpenClaw Community

discord_api.description: Makes API calls to Discord to fetch bot info, guilds, and channels
discord_api.mitigation: Only reads data; no destructive operations without explicit user action

token_validation.description: Tests Discord bot tokens against the API
token_validation.mitigation: Tokens are validated but not logged; masked in UI responses (last 4 chars only)

source_modification.description: Modifies Clawdbot source files to install UI components and handlers
source_modification.mitigation: Creates backups before modification; provides uninstall script

build_execution.description: Runs pnpm build commands to compile changes
build_execution.mitigation: Only runs standard build commands; can be skipped with --skip-build

securityNotes.token_handling: Bot tokens are never returned in full via RPC - only masked (last 4 chars). Store tokens securely using OpenBao vault references.
securityNotes.api_calls: All Discord API calls use the configured bot token. The skill does not store tokens itself beyond config.
securityNotes.permissions: The skill only reads data from Discord API by default. Destructive operations require explicit user action.
securityNotes.source_changes: Installation modifies Clawdbot source files. Backups are created automatically.

installInstructions.manual: See SKILL.md for detailed manual installation steps
requirements: Discord bot token from Developer Portal

installWarnings: Discord bot token required - create at discord.com/developers
Message Content Intent must be enabled in Discord Developer Portal
